name: Recursive Reindeer (local gamejam 12-4-2020 - 12-6-2020 )
description:
Santa claus is confused for satan in a local town,  they have boarded up their chimneys! you must use the button to unlock the chimneys! 

Controls 
W - Move left,D - Move right , 1 - use reindeer 1, 2- use reindeer 2, 3- use reindeer 3, mouse click to fire the reindeer! R to restart the current level and escape to close the game

Credits:
Lead concept holde, level designerr- Pizza Tiger(me)
Lead programmer - David S.
